reviews.review: сюжет классный, перевод заслуживающий, детство лучшее
Игра очень интересная и с неожиданным поворотом. В этой игре ты даже будешь разговаривать с картошкой нуу ты сам поймёш
o modo coop e muito bom

La verdad el juego es bueno la historia no es solo pruebas mas pruebas y el jefe final, Este juego cuenta mas historia y la conexion con Half-Life (O eso creo)  me encanto y esta barato (Cuando yo lo compre) ahora pongo la traduccion.

Gracias por leer

The game is really good, the story is not only tests, more tests and the final boss, This game tells more history and the connection with Half-Life (Or so I think) I love it and it's cheap (When I buy it)

Thank you for reading

Wow, Ive never witnessed such a good game, The co-op is amazing, The story is absolutely a masterpiece, It got me emotional, and the plot twits, MMM, thats the good stuff. I will Just go through a list of pros and cons

Pros:

Fun game, amazing story, cool co-op, Funny jokes, game hat everyone can play, amazing physics and art

Cons: 

Some puzzles are just too much, Chapter 7 - 8 are just pile of nonsense and nerve wracking as heck

Would I reccomend it?

ABSOLUTLEY YES! The price is totally worth it and You dont need to overspec your pc.
Super gra , gdzie musisz się wysilić a do tego jest co-op
在库里待了这么多年也没有找到小伙伴一起玩
Игра топ дает глубоко мыслить и хорошо задумать. Очень классная картинка. особенно круто проходить вместе с другом!

Игра с отличным сюжетом, обожаю эту игру, прошёл бы её, но ноут мой стал печкой 
(((((((((((
Sadece coop oynadım ve gerçekten çok eğlenceli bir oyun bir süre sonra kendini tekrar edişi sıkmaya başlıyor ama ara verilerek oynanırsa sarar.
单人剧情十分有意思，后面我直接爱上GlaDOS，最后的告别和歌曲部分让我意犹未尽，好游戏啊

Thinking is always the opposite of feeling. Yet, Portal 2 successfully brings both of them together in a single game. A brain whacking puzzle followed by a tear jerking song. Truly an unique game with beautiful execution.

Believe me, you will never regret buying this game, especially if you bought it on 80% discount.
mükemmel 2011 de almak istediğim oyun 2 tl y di indirim için teşekkürler sonunda oynadım 9 yıl sonra
Игра класс! она очень затягивает и хочется играть в неё много, но только надо хорошо думать куда ставить порталы и т.д.
Игрушка прикольная. Можно подумать и сюжет есть.
I really enjoyed the story. Thats it
ah chit, here we go again
I've never seen a game balance horror and comedy so well
I love this game. It is one of the most exciting and fun games I have ever played. Would recommend.
It's great puzzle game with lots of charm. It's probably the best coop experience I have ever had. The single player is pretty good as well. I enjoyed it enough to buy it for the pc and xbox 360.

Its super fun. To be honest I got it on the sale for two dollars but I would have bought for ten dollars anyway. The graphics are super good and even if you a lower type computer it can still handle it.
Zeka ister ve bende o yok :P
It's really fun to play with friends and get frustrated together!
Я бы хотел скушать тортик, но это ложь.(((

O modo história é sensacional já o coop é bom se vc tiver um amigo pra jogar. É praticamente fazer portal no lugar certo pra chegar na saída, só q nisso vc vai ter q usar o raciocínio lógico e se comunicar com seu colega pra saber na onde colocar esses portais.
this is an amazing game the stroy is so unice and very origanal
I really like the idea of portal gun that creates portals. Really awesome story and gameplay.

Esse jogo é perfeito, modo história impécavel, personagens comicos e caricatos, coop divertidissimo pra jogar com amigos. O único defeito é ser feito pela Valve, que infelizmente, não sabe contar até 3.
사실상 밸브의 마지막게임, 이이후로 젖망한 카드겜하나 내고 게임이 안나오는중... 마지막게임답게 존나 재미따

10/10 best game ever, must play.

why havent you played this yet its portal 2 for crying out loud
An amazing sequel to the original. I especially love how the game goes further with the story and history of Aperture. A masterpiece from Valve. Only one thing. When are we getting another?
10/10 would argue w my bf over where to place a portal again :3
I don't want your damn lemons! What am i supposed to do with these???
Buenardo, me gusta que metan mas mecanicas mientras avanzan o se compliquen un poco mas los niveles
this game is just awsome, it has the best story i have ever played but its a little hard and theres some swearing near the end of the game but nothing to bad
I have way too much time on this game
Auch viele Jahre nach Release noch sehr unterhaltsam und ein Toptitel für entspannte Koop-Runden.
Top tier puzzle game with awesome writing and awesome coop too.
Simplemente Genial. A pesar del paso del tiempo

not a FPS, the only thing you shoot are holes. the neat twist is that you shoot the entrance to a hole and its exit with right or left mouse button. want an infinite hole, put the exit above the entrance, want to cross a chasm, put one each side, sneak up on a bot by putting an exit behind them each level is a puzzle, with mostly one way to complete. when you've finished these, there are hundreds of user created levels and episodes to try

Хотите немного напрячь свои мозги и хорошо провести время? Тогда игра точно для вас. Особой критики нету, игра однозначно стоит своих денег(особенно если по акции). Жаль только что игра проходится слишком быстро (в неспешном темпе потратил 6 часов), но это нивелируется наличием кооператива для двух человек на сторонних от сюжета картах.
Şimdi Diyen Olur 3 Saat Oynayıp Yorum Yapmış Ama 3 Saatte Bile Arkadaşımla Beni Bambaşka Bir Dünyaya Sokan Oyundu Portal 2 Bulmaca Tarzı Oyunları Seviyorsanız Bu Oyun Tam Siz Ve Arkadaşınıza Göre :)
Doesn't surpass the original, but enjoyable and has more mechanics to play around with.
